summary: When Tom comes home on Valentine's Day to a "Dear John" Letter from his girlfriend, he spends the rest of the night talking to his four best friends about woman, sex & love until five women show up and the battle of the sexes begins.
cast: Cuba Gooding Jr.|Matthew Lillard|Sean Astin|Mars Callahan|Andrew Daly|Gina Gershon|Anne Heche|Tamala Jones|Shiri Appleby|Jud Tylor|Terrence 'T.C.' Carson|Gillian Shure|Victoria Pratt|Steve Makhania|Roxanne Arvizu|Ines Brigman|Roneique Banks|Marjan Faritous|Brookelyn Freed|Amanda Keffer|Melony Larose|Wrenna Monet|Johnny Drocco|Greg Fellows
title: What Love Is
